datascibox
===============================

version number: 0.0.1
author: Baris Ozmen

Overview
--------

A  box of data science utilities for Python

Installation / Usage
--------------------

To install use pip:

    $ pip install datascibox


Or clone the repo:

    $ git clone https://github.com/barisozmen/datascibox.git
    $ python setup.py install
